headline.main: NEW GUINEA DEAD HONORED; Australians at U.S. Service -- Writers at Darnton's Grave

lead_paragraph: SOMEWHERE IN NEW GUINEA, May 30 (Delayed) (U.P.) -- Australian and American troops joined today in ceremonies among the white crosses in a green New Guinea valley, honoring their war dead on the second overseas Memorial Day services for United States troops in the Southwest Pacific area.
